Title: Chapter 24
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), John Mankiewicz, Beau Willimon
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Mahershala Ali
Plot: Frank is questioned by a special prosecutor. Remy Danton is trying to keep all options open. Stamper is struggling with his demons.
